segments.text: Ugh, the sink is overflowing with water gushing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman's just polishing her plate, ignoring the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the filthy puddle—gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids raiding the cookie jar like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting, probably dirty from the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand deep in the jar—hope he washed them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl begging for one, all excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinets, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is sloppy and careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks clean, unlike this disaster inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching such neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, probably germy now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a revolting lack of attention.
segments.speaker: PAR
